title: Have you received any Honor Notification in S7?
body: So it's been a while since we updated to the latest client. One thing I felt uncomfortable with is that I have never got any honor notification (such as Teamwork, Helpful or Honorable Opponent) in the new client. Back to S6, I usually got at least one or two honors every 5 to 10 games or so, but this no longer happens. I'm not sure if the client is not complete enough to integrate the honoring system or if my teammates are not honoring me any more? Are you having the same situation?
